FCCANALYSIS(1) fccanalysis man page FCCANALYSIS(1)

NAME

fccanalysis – write, build and run your FCC analysis

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis [-h] [-v | -vv | -vvv] <sub-command> [<args>]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis is the manager program for the FCC analysis, which can build, run or submit analysis to the batch.

OPTIONS

-h, --help
Prints short help message and exits.
-v, --verbose
Makes output verbose. RDataFrame verbosity level is set to ROOT.Experimental.ELogLevel.kInfo.
-vv, --more-verbose
Makes output more verbose. RDataFrame verbosity level is set to ROOT.Experimental.ELogLevel.kDebug.
-vvv, --most-verbose
Makes output even more verbose. RDataFrame verbosity level is set to ROOT.Experimental.ELogLevel.kDebug+10 --- outputs also generated code.

SUB-COMMANDS

fccanalysis-init
[Experimental] Generate a RDataFrame based FCC analysis package.
fccanalysis-build
Helper to build and install FCCAnalyses framework.
fccanalysis-pin
Pin analysis to the currently sourced version of the Key4hep stack.
fccanalysis-run
Runs the analysis script provided.
fccanalysis-final
Runs the finalization analysis script provided.
fccanalysis-plots
Generate plots based on the plots analysis file provided.
fccanalysis-test
Helper to run tests of the full FCCAnalyses framework.

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis-run(1), fccanalysis-script(7)

BUGS

Many
